goal.en: The goal of the course is designed for students of multivariate statistics with a unified treatment of both theoretical and practical aspects of this fascinating area. The course also provides many useful multivariate statistical methods for a broad readership, including students in biology, anthropology, life sciences, data mining, artificial intelligence, and other areas.
goal.ch: The goal of the course is designed for students of multivariate statistics with a unified treatment of both theoretical and practical aspects of this fascinating area. The course also provides many useful multivariate statistical methods for a broad readership, including students in biology, anthropology, life sciences, data mining, artificial intelligence, and other areas.

content.en:
1 2/17 Why Multivariate Statistics
2 2/24 Multivariate Normal Distribution
3 3/3 Normal Mixtures
4 3/10 Discrimination and Classification
5 3/17 Multiple Discriminant Analysis
6 3/24 Principal Component Analysis
7 3/31 Exploratory Factor Analysis
8 4/7 Canonical Correlation
9 4/14 Midterm Exam
10 4/21 Model Assessment and Selection
11 4/28 Tree-based method and boosting
12 5/5 Support Vector Machines and Flexible Discriminants
13 5/12 Prototype Methods and Nearest-Neighbors
14 5/19 Multidimensional Scaling
15 5/26 Principal Components: Curves and Surfaces
16 6/2 Cluster Analysis
17 6/9 Independent Component Analysis and Exploratory Projection Pursuit
18 6/16 Final Exam

textbook.en: A first course in multivariate statistics (Flury, B., 1997) The Elements of Statistical Learning (Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R., and Friedman, J., 2008)
textbook.ch: A first course in multivariate statistics (Flury, B., 1997) The Elements of Statistical Learning (Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R., and Friedman, J., 2008)

grading.en: In this course, we will have midterm exam (30%), final exam (30%), and group assignments (40%). Bonus: Kaggle (10%)
grading.ch: In this course, we will have midterm exam (30%), final exam (30%), and group assignments (40%). Bonus: Kaggle (10%)

en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementST6021、Prerequisite Course RequirementST6038 only.With an average of 70 or above for Required Subjects.
ch: 學制:限學士班。指定課程:必須先修ST6021、先修ST6038。且檢定指定課程平均成績達70分以上。
